title: DeepMTD: Moving Target Defense for Deep Visual Sensing against Adversarial Examples
abstract: Deep learning-based visual sensing has achieved attractive accuracy but is shown vulnerable to adversarial attacks. Specifically, once the attackers obtain the deep model, they can construct advers...
